title: Bug 121170: get column label from meta data object should return some user recognizable strings
description: When retrieving column labels from a meta data object, the labels returned before extraction are null, while the ones after extraction are recognizable strings.
OB: The labels returned before extraction are null.
EB: Since the labels need to be displayed to the end user before doing the extraction, the method 'getcolumnlabel' before extraction should also return the same labels as after extraction, which are recognizable strings.
SR:
1. Retrieve the meta data object.
2. Call the 'getcolumnlabel' method to obtain the column labels.
3. Verify that the labels returned are the same before and after extraction, and they are recognizable strings.
